```py
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

data = np.arange(5, 10)
plt.plot(data)
```

```py
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

data = np.arange(5, 10)
fig, ax = plt.subplots()
ax.plot(data)
```

```py
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

x = np.arange(-5, 5, 0.1)
y = np.cosh(x)

plt.title('A Catenary')
plt.xlabel('Horizontal Distance')
plt.ylabel('Height')
plt.xlim(-8, 8)
plt.ylim(0, 60)
plt.grid()
plt.plot(x, y, lw=3, color='firebrick')
```

```py
time = np.arange(-12.5, 12.5, 0.1)
amplitude = np.sin(time)
amplitude_halved = np.sin(time) / 2
```

```py
plt.plot(time, amplitude, c='k', label='sine1')
plt.plot(time, amplitude_halved, c='firebrick', ls='--', label='sine2')
plt.legend()
```

```py
plt.subplot(2, 1, 1)
plt.plot(time, amplitude, label='sine1')
plt.legend(loc='upper right')

plt.subplot(2, 1, 2)
plt.ylim(-1, 1)
plt.plot(time, amplitude_halved, label='sine2')
plt.legend(loc='best')
```

```py
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

x = np.arange(-5, 5, 0.1)
y = np.cosh(x)

fig, ax = plt.subplots()
```

```py
ax.set(title='A Catenary',
        xlabel='Horizontal Distance',
        ylabel='Height',
        xlim=(-8, 8.1),
        ylim=(0, 60))
```

```py
fig, ((ax1, ax2), (ax3, ax4)) = plt.subplots(2, 2)
ax3.plot([1, 2, 3])
fig.tight_layout()
```
